K02sspp2_2u:1121: yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1128: yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
K02sspp2_2u:1137: yo dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1153: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1154: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1155: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1156: yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1157: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1158: yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
K02sspp2_2u:1160: yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1162: yas tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1163: yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1164: ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1165: yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na so vijñānadhātuḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1168: yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1170: yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ, (ŚsP II-2 29)
K02sspp2_2u:1173: yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1174: yas tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
K02sspp2_2u:1177: yo jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1180: yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1181: yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1182: yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1183: yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1184: yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1185: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
K02sspp2_2u:1188: yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1190: yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1191: yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1192: yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1193: yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1196: yo navarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā navarāgraśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1198: yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1199: yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1200: yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1203: yaḥ svabhavaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1206: yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1207: yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1208: ya ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1210: yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1211: yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1212: ya āryāṣṭāṅgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1213: ya āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1214: yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1216: ya ārūpyasamāpattīnān anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, (ŚsP II-2 30)
K02sspp2_2u:1217: yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1219: yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1220: ya abhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1221: yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1222: yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1223: yas tathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni tathāgatabalāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1224: yo vaiśāradyānām antpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1225: yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tā pratisaṃvidaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1226: yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
K02sspp2_2u:1227: yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā karuṇā,
K02sspp2_2u:1228: ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1230: yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1231: yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1232: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
K02sspp2_2u:1234: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1235: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1236: vedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā vedanayā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā vedanā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1237: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1238: saṃjñāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā saṃjñayā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā saṃjñā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1239: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
K02sspp2_2u:1240: saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāḥ saṃskārair ya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na te saṃskārā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1241: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1242: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ vijñāneṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1243: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam.
K02sspp2_2u:1244: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ cakṣuṣā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tac cakṣur notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1245: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yac cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1246: śrotram āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ śrotreṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tac chrotraṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1247: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotraṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1249: śūnyaṃ ghrāṇena yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1250: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1251: jihvāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā jihvayā yāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā jihvā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1252: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
K02sspp2_2u:1253: kāya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ kāyeṇa ya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo na sa kāyo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1254: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1255: mana āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ manasā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tan mano notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1256: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaso 'nutpādo na tan manaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1257: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1258: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1260: yaś ca śūnyo na sa śabdo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1261: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1262: gandha āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo gandhena yaś ca śūnyo na sa gandho notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1263: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1264: rasa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo rasena yaś ca śūnyo na sa raso notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1265: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rasasyānutpādo na sa rasaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1267: yaś ca śūnyo na sa sparśo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1268: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1269: dharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā dharmair ye ca śūnyā na te dharmā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1270: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dharṃānām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1272: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1273: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1275: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1276: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1278: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1279: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1282: yac ca śūnyaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1283: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1285: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yat kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1287: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan manovijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1288: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānam.
K02sspp2_2u:1289: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena yaś ca śūnyo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1290: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1292: yaś ca śūnyo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1293: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1295: yaś ca śūnyo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1296: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1298: yaś ca śūnyo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1299: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1301: yaś ca śūnyo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1302: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1304: yaś ca śūnyo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1305: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1307: yā ca śūnyā na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1308: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyaya vedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1310: yā ca śūnyā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1314: yā ca śūnyā na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1315: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1317: yā ca śūnyā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1318: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1320: yā ca śūnyā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1321: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1323: yā ca śūnyā na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1324: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
K02sspp2_2u:1326: yaś ca śūnyo na sa pṛthivīdhātur notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1327: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1329: yaś ca śūnyo na so 'bdhātur notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1330: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bdhātor anutpādo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1332: yaś ca śūnyo na sa tejodhātur notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1333: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yas tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1335: yaś ca śūnyo na sa vāyudhātur notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1336: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1338: yaś ca śūnyo na sa ākāśadhātur notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1339: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1341: yaś ca śūnyo na sa vijñānadhātur notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1342: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1345: yā ca śūnyā na sāvidyā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1346: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo avidyāyā anutpādo na sāvidyā,
K02sspp2_2u:1348: ye ca śūnyā na te saṃskārā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1349: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ vijñānena,
K02sspp2_2u:1350: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1351: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1353: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1354: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1356: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1357: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1359: yaś ca śūnyo na sa sparśo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1360: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1362: yā ca śūnyā na sā vedanā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1363: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vedanāyām anutpādo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1365: yā ca śūnyā na sā tṛṣṇā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1366: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yas tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
K02sspp2_2u:1368: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad upādānaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1369: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1371: yaś ca śūnyo na sa bhavo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1372: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1374: yā ca śūnyā na sā jātir notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1375: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1377: yac ca śūnyaṃ na taj jarāmaraṇaṃ notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1378: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
K02sspp2_2u:1380: yā ca śūnyā na sā dānapāramitā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1381: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1383: yā ca śūnyā na sā śīlapāramitā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1384: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā (ŚsP II-2 35)
K02sspp2_2u:1387: yā ca śūnyā na sā kṣāntipāramitā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1388: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1390: yā ca śūnyā na sā vīryapāramitā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1391: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1393: yā ca śūnyā na sā dhyānapāramitā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1394: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1396: yā ca śūnyā na sā prajñāpāramitā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1397: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
K02sspp2_2u:1399: yā ca śūnyā na sādhyātmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1400: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1402: yā ca śūnyā na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1403: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1405: yā ca śūnyā na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1406: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1408: yā ca śūnyā na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1409: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1411: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1412: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1414: yā ca śūnyā na sā paramārthaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1415: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1417: yā ca śūnyā na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1418: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1421: yā ca śūnyā na sātyantaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1422: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'tyantaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sātyantaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1424: yā ca śūnyā na sānavarāgraśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1425: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'navarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1427: yā ca śūnyā na sānavakāraśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1428: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'navakāraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1430: yā ca śūnyā na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1431: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1433: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1434: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1436: yā ca śūnyā na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1437: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1439: yā ca śūnyā na sānupalambhaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1440: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'nupalambhaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1442: yā ca śūnyā na sābhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1443: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1445: yā ca śūnyā na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1446: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1448: yā ca śūnyā na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1449: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
K02sspp2_2u:1450: smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni smṛtyupasthānaṃ yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1451: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1453: samyakprahāṇair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni samyakprahāṇāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1454: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1455: ṛddhipādā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā ṛddhipādair yā ca śūnyā na te ṛddhipādā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1456: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na te ṛddhipādāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1457: indriyāṇi āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyānīndriyair yāni ca śūnyāni na tānīndriyāṇi notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1458: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇi,
K02sspp2_2u:1459: balāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni balair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni balāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1460: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1461: bodhyaṅgāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni bodhyaṅgair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni bodhyaṅgāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1462: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1463: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnya āryāṣṭāṅgamārgena yaś ca śūnyo na sa mārgo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1464: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyānutpādo na sa mārgaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1466: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny āryasatyāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1467: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1469: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny dhyānāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1470: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāny dhyānāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1472: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny apramāṇāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1473: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo pramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1475: yāś ca śūnyā na tā ārūpyasamāpattayo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1476: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1478: ye ca śūnyā na te vimokṣā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1479: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1481: yāś ca śūnyā na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1482: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1484: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1485: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1487: yāś ca śūnyā na tā abhijñā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1488: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhijñāyā anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1490: ye ca śūnyā na te samādhayo notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1492: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1493: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1495: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni tathāgatabalāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1496: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ tathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni tathāgatabalāni,
K02sspp2_2u:1498: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni vaiśāradyāni notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1499: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1500: yāś ca śūnyā na tā pratisaṃvido notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1501: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tā pratisaṃvidaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1503: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahāmaitrī notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1504: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
K02sspp2_2u:1506: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahākaruṇā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
K02sspp2_2u:1508: ye ca śūnyā na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1510: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvajñatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1511: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
K02sspp2_2u:1513: yā ca śūnyā na sā mārgākārajñatā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo (ŚsP II-2 39)
K02sspp2_2u:1516: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvākārajñatā notpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1517: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
K02sspp2_2u:1518: āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi?
K02sspp2_2u:1519: yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1520: yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1521: yaḥ saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
K02sspp2_2u:1522: yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1523: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam.
K02sspp2_2u:1524: yaś cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1525: yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotraṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1526: yo ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1527: yo jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
K02sspp2_2u:1528: yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1529: yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1530: yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1531: yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na sa śabdaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1532: yo gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1533: yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1534: yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1535: yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1536: yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1537: yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1538: yo ghrāṇavijñanasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1539: yo jihvāvijñanasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1540: yaḥ kāyavijñanasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1541: yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
K02sspp2_2u:1542: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1543: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa chrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1544: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1545: yo jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1546: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1547: yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1548: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1549: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1550: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1551: yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1552: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1553: yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
K02sspp2_2u:1554: yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1556: yas tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1557: yo vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1558: ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1559: yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:1562: yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1563: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1564: yo nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1565: yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1566: yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1567: yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
K02sspp2_2u:1568: yas tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
K02sspp2_2u:1569: ya upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:1570: yo bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1571: yo jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:1572: yo jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
K02sspp2_2u:1573: yo dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1574: yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā śīlapāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1575: yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vyayo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1576: yo vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā vīryapāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:1577: yo dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dhyānapāramitā,

K02sspp2_2u:2536: cakṣur anutpādaḥ śrotram anutpādo ghrāṇam anutpādo jihvānutpādaḥ kāyo 'nutpādo mano 'nutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2537: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo dharmā anutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2539: śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2540: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2543: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2544: avidyānutpādaḥ saṃskārā anutpādo vijñānam anutpādo nāmarūpam anutpādaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam
K02sspp2_2u:2545: anutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ tṛṣṇānutpāda upādānam anutpādo bhavo 'nutpādo
K02sspp2_2u:2547: dānapāramitānutpādaḥ śīlapāramitānutpādaḥ kṣāntipāramitānutpādo vīryapāramitānutpādo dhyānapāramitānutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitānutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2553: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy
K02sspp2_2u:2554: anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny
K02sspp2_2u:2555: anutpādaś catvāri dhyānāny anutpādaś catvāry apramāṇāny anutpāda catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo
K02sspp2_2u:2558: samādhayo 'nutpādo dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ daśatathāgatabalāny anutpādaś catvāri
K02sspp2_2u:2559: vaiśāradyāny anutpādaś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādo mahāmaitry anutpādo mahākaruṇānutpādo
K02sspp2_2u:2578: buddhadharmā apy anutpādaḥ. tat prāptam eva bhavati śrāvakayāṇikaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāptaiva bhavati,
K02sspp2_2u:2580: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ bhede na bhaviṣyati prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahasattvena pañcavidhā bodhiḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2582: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ srotaāpannena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:2584: anāgāminā pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:2585: arhatā pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:2587: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāñ carati yad duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ kṛtane pratyanubhavati?
K02sspp2_2u:2591: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat:
K02sspp2_2u:2592: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpādasya dharmasya prāptim icchāmi na samayaṃ cānutpādasya srotaāpattitvam icchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2594: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānutpādasyānāgāmitvam icchāmi nānāgāmiphalaṃ nānutpādasyārhattvam icchāmi nārhattvasākṣātkriyāṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:2595: nānutpādasya pratyekabuddhatvam icchāmi na pratyekabodhir nāpy aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrecchāmi
K02sspp2_2u:2596: yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāṃ caran nāpi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkarasaṃjñayā
K02sspp2_2u:2598: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ janayitvāśakyam aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:2599: sattvānām arthaṃ kartum api tv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvattveyumātṛsaṃjñā janayitvā
K02sspp2_2u:2600: pitṛsaṃjñāṃ janayitvā putrasaṃjñā janayitvāsakyam aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām
K02sspp2_2u:2601: arthakartun tac cānupalambhayogena evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:2602: yathātmātmeti cocyate sa ca sarveṇa sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_2u:2604: saced evaṃ saṃjñām utpādayitavyeti duṣkarasaṃjñām utpadayiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:2605: tathā hi na sa kaccit tad dharmam utpādayati nopalabhyate nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpāde
K02sspp2_2u:2606: tathāgatam icchāmi nānuttarā saṃyaksaṃbodhir yathā tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ
K02sspp2_2u:2607: na hy anutpannena dharmeṇa prāptiḥ prāpyate.
K02sspp2_2u:2608: āha: kim punas tvam āyuṣman subhūte utpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchasi?
K02sspp2_2u:2611: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpānnena dharmeṇa prāptim icchāmi nāpy anutpannena dharmeṇa prāpyamāṇām.
K02sspp2_2u:2612: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2614: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prāptir asty abhisamayo na punaḥ paramārthena dharmeṇa.
K02sspp2_2u:2615: api tu khalu punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokavyavahāreṇa prāptir abhisamayo vā
K02sspp2_2u:2616: prajñāpyate lokavyavahāreṇa srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā nāgāmī vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho
K02sspp2_2u:2617: vā bodhisattvo vā prajñayate. na punaḥ paramārthena prāptir vābhisamayo vā srotaāpanno vā (ŚsP II-2 67)
K02sspp2_2u:2618: sakṛdāgāmī vānāgāmī vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā buddho vā prajñapyate.
K02sspp2_2u:2619: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ lokavyavahāreṇa bhedo na punaḥ paramārthena?
K02sspp2_2u:2620: āha: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ lokavyavahāreṇa bhedo na punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:2621: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paramārtheṇa karmaṇaḥ karamavipākaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:2622: notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2623: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte 'nutpanno dharma utpadyate,
K02sspp2_2u:2627: āha: katamasyāyuṣman subhūte anutpannasya dharmasyotpādaṃ necchasi?
K02sspp2_2u:2637: jihvāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2646: dharmānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
K02sspp2_2u:2659: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2660: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2661: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2662: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2663: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2664: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
K02sspp2_2u:2665: pṛthivīdhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2668: tejodhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2669: vāyudhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2670: ākāśadhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2671: vijñānadhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
K02sspp2_2u:2672: avidyāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2673: saṃskārāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2678: vedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2679: tṛṣṇāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2682: jāter aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2684: dānapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2685: śīlapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2686: kṣāntipāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2687: vīryapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2688: dhyānapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2689: prajñāpāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
K02sspp2_2u:2690: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2691: bahirdhāśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2693: aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2694: śūnyatāśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2695: mahāśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2696: paramārthaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2697: saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2698: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2699: atyantaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2700: anavarāgraśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2701: anavakāraśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2702: prakṛtiśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2703: sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2704: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2705: anupalambhaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2706: abhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2707: svabhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2708: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
K02sspp2_2u:2709: smṛtyupasthānānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2710: samyakprahāṇānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2711: ṛddhipādānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2712: indriyāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2713: balānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2714: bodhyaṅgānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2716: āryasatyānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām (ŚsP II-2 71)
K02sspp2_2u:2718: dhyānānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2719: apramāṇānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2720: ārūpyasamāpattīnām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2721: vimokṣāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2722: anupūrvavihārasamāpattlnām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2723: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2724: abhijñānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2725: samādhīnām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2726: dhāraṇīmukhānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2727: tathāgatabalānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2728: vaiśāradyānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2729: pratisaṃvidām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2730: mahāmaitryā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2731: mahākaruṇāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2732: āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2733: srotaāpattiphalasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2737: pratyekabodher aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2738: sarvajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2739: mārgākārajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2742: āha: katamasya tvam āyuṣman subhūte utpannasya dharmasyotpādaṃ necchasi?
K02sspp2_2u:2743: āha: rūpasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2744: vedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2745: saṃjñāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,

K02sspp2_2u:2759: dharmāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi.

K02sspp2_2u:2777: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2778: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
K02sspp2_2u:2779: pṛthivīdhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2780: abdhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2781: tejodhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2782: vāyudhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2783: ākāśadhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2784: vijñānadhātor aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
K02sspp2_2u:2785: avidyāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2786: saṃskārāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2790: necchāmi, sparśasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2791: vedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2792: tṛṣṇāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2795: jāter aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2797: dānapāramitāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,

K02sspp2_2u:2810: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2811: atyantaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2814: anavakāraśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2815: prakṛtiśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2817: aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2818: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2819: anupalambhaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2820: abhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2821: svabhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2822: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
K02sspp2_2u:2823: smṛtyupasthānānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2824: samyakprahāṇānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2825: ṛddhipādānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2826: indriyāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2827: balānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2828: bodhyaṅgānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2830: āryasatyānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2831: dhyānānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2832: apramāṇānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2833: ārūpyasamāpattīnām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2834: vimokṣāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2835: anupūrvavihārasamāpattinām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2836: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2837: abhijñānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2838: samādhīnām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2839: dhāraṇīmukhānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2841: tathāgatabalānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2842: vaiśāradyānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2843: pratisaṃvidām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2844: mahāmaitryā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2845: mahākaruṇāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2846: āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2847: srotaāpattiphalasyāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannānāṃ svabhāvaśūnyānām utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2851: pratyekabodher aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2852: sarvajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2853: mārgākārajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,
K02sspp2_2u:2854: sarvākārajñatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi.
K02sspp2_2u:2856: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpāda utpadyate?
K02sspp2_2u:2858: āha: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpāda utpadyate,
K02sspp2_2u:2860: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś cotpādo yaś cānutpāda ubhāv etau dharmau na
K02sspp2_2u:2861: saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇo yad utālakṣaṇaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2862: tad anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa notpāda utpadyate,
K02sspp2_2u:2865: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti te mantrayitum,
K02sspp2_2u:2866: anutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo hy āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti mantrayitum.
K02sspp2_2u:2868: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 77)
K02sspp2_2u:2869: chāradvatīputra yac ca pratibhāti te mantrayitum iti,
K02sspp2_2u:2870: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na me pratibhāti mantrayitum,
K02sspp2_2u:2871: anutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo 'pi me āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na pratibhāti mantrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:2872: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś cānutpanno dharmo yaś cānutpādo yac ca pratibhānaṃ
K02sspp2_2u:2873: ye ca mantrā yā cānutpattiḥ sarvadharmā ete na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā
K02sspp2_2u:2875: āha: anutpāda ity āyuṣman subhūte mantraḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:2878: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
K02sspp2_2u:2880: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra anutpādo mantro 'nutpādaḥ pratibhāno 'nutpādo dharmaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:2881: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:2882: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpam anutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ saṃjñānutpādaḥ saṃskārānutpādo vijñānam anutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2883: cakṣur anutpādaḥ śrotram anutpādo ghrāṇam anutpādo jihvānutpādaḥ kāyo 'nutpādo mano 'nutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2884: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo dharmā anutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2886: śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2887: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2890: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2892: avidyānutpādaḥ saṃskārā anutpādo vijñānam anutpādo nāmarūpam anutpādaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam
K02sspp2_2u:2893: anutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ tṛṣṇānutpāda upādānam anutpādo bhavo 'nutpādo
K02sspp2_2u:2895: dānapāramitānutpādaḥ śīlapāramitānutpādaḥ kṣāntipāramitānutpādo vīryapāramitānutpādo dhyānapāramitānutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitānutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2901: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy
K02sspp2_2u:2902: anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny
K02sspp2_2u:2903: anutpādo dhyānāny anutpādo 'pramāṇāny anutpāda ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nutpādo vimokṣānutpādo
K02sspp2_2u:2906: samādhayo 'nutpādo dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ tathāgatabalāny anutpādo vaiśāradyāny
K02sspp2_2u:2907: anutpādaḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādo mahāmaitry anutpādo mahākaruṇānutpāda āveṇikabuddhadharmā anutpādaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:2908: srotaāpattiphalam anutpādaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anutpādo 'nāgāmiphalam anutpādo 'rhattvam anutpādaḥ pratyekabodhir anutpādaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:2910: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇānutpādo mantro 'nutpādaṃ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:2911: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
K02sspp2_2u:2912: āha: dharmakathikānām agratāyām ayam āyuṣman subhūtiḥ sthāpayitavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:2913: tathā hi subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripṛcchyate tatas tata eva niḥsarati.
K02sspp2_2u:2915: dharmataiṣāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakānām aniśritānāṃ sarvadharmeṣu te yato yata eva paripṛcchyante (ŚsP II-2 79)
K02sspp2_2u:2916: tatas tata eva niḥsaranti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:2920: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:2921: vedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:2922: saṃjñāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:2923: saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antreṇopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:2924: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_2u:2925: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na
K02sspp2_2u:2927: śrotram āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:2928: ghrāṇam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:2929: jihvāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
