K02sspp2_2u:3032: mārgākārajñatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:3034: chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_2u:3035: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā aniśritāḥ prakṛtiśūnyām upādāya.
K02sspp2_2u:3036: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā rūpaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:3071: pṛthivīdhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo 'bdhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ tejodhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo vāyudhātuḥ pariśodhayitavya ākāśadhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo vijñānadhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:3132: athāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra punar āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K02sspp2_2u:3133: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayati?
K02sspp2_2u:3135: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitā laukiky asti (ŚsP II-2 87)
K02sspp2_2u:3142: āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte dānapāramitā laukikī katamā lokottarā?
K02sspp2_2u:3144: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dātā bhavati dānapatiḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakāyācanakebhyaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:3145: annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo yānaṃ yānārthikebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthikebhyaḥ
K02sspp2_2u:3146: puṣpaṃ puṣpārthikebhyo mālyaṃ mālyārthikebhyo gandhaṃ gandhārthikebhyo vilepanaṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3147: vilepanārthikebhya upāśrayam upāśrayārthikebhya śayyāsanaṃ śayyāsanārthikebhya upakaraṇam
K02sspp2_2u:3149: yāvad anyatarānyatarā mānuṣyakāpariṣkārān dadāti putrārthikebhyaḥ putraṃ dadāti duhitṛkārthikebhyo duhitṛn dadāti bhāryārthikebhyo bhāryāṃ dadāti rājyārthikebhyo rājyaṃ dadāti,
K02sspp2_2u:3154: tac ca saṃniśritaḥ parityajati tasyaivaṃ bhavati,
K02sspp2_2u:3160: tac ca dānaṃ datvopalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3161: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dānaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā
K02sspp2_2u:3163: sa triṣu saṃyogeṣu saktas tad dānaṃ dadāti,
K02sspp2_2u:3165: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dānasaṃjñāyām eṣu triṣu saṃyogeṣu sakto dānaṃ dadāti. iyam ucyate laukikī dānapāramitā. kena kāraṇenocyate laukikī dānapāramiteti?
K02sspp2_2u:3166: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati,
K02sspp2_2u:3167: na ca saṃkrāmati tenocyate laukikī dānapāramitā.
K02sspp2_2u:3171: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvas tad dānaṃ dadann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhyate dānaṃ nopalabhyate vipākañ (ŚsP II-2
K02sspp2_2u:3172: ca nābhinandati. iyam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:3173: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānaṃ dadāti sarvasattvebhyaś ca tad dānaṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:3174: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. iyam ucyate āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokottarā dānapāramitā. kena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti?
K02sspp2_2u:3175: tathā hi lokottareti lokā carati saṃkrāmati tenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti.
K02sspp2_2u:3176: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śīlapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
K02sspp2_2u:3178: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati tac ca saṃniśrito
K02sspp2_2u:3179: bhavati tasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham śīlaṃ rakṣāmi sattvānām arthāya. idam śīlam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3180: karomi tac ca śīlaṃ rakṣann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3181: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me śīlaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmeṣu sukhino
K02sspp2_2u:3182: bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tac chīlaṃ rakṣati
K02sspp2_2u:3183: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ śīlasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī śīlapāramiteti.
K02sspp2_2u:3184: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
K02sspp2_2u:3188: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate
K02sspp2_2u:3189: sattvān nopalabhyate śīlaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś ca
K02sspp2_2u:3190: tac chīlaṃ niryātayati. tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K02sspp2_2u:3191: pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā śīlapāramitā tathā
K02sspp2_2u:3192: hi lokā carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
K02sspp2_2u:3193: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kṣāntipāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
K02sspp2_2u:3195: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati,
K02sspp2_2u:3197: tasyaivaṃ bhavatv ahaṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayāmi sarvasattvānām arthāya,
K02sspp2_2u:3198: iyaṃ kṣāntir ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karoti tañ ca kṣāntiṃ bhāvayann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ (ŚsP II-2 89)
K02sspp2_2u:3200: anena me kṣāntiphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv
K02sspp2_2u:3201: iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tā kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3202: kṣāntisaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī kṣāntipāramiteti. tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati
K02sspp2_2u:3207: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:3209: sarvasattvebhyaś ca tāṃ kṣāntiṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:3210: 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. iyam ucyate lokottarā kṣāntipāramitā,
K02sspp2_2u:3211: tathā hi lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
K02sspp2_2u:3212: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vīryapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
K02sspp2_2u:3214: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhate,
K02sspp2_2u:3215: tac ca saṃniśrita ārabhate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryam ārabhate sarvasattvānām arthāya,
K02sspp2_2u:3216: ayaṃ kāya idaṃ cittam idaṃ vīryam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomy ahaṃ vīryapāramitāyāñ carāmi
K02sspp2_2u:3217: tac ca vīryam upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
K02sspp2_2u:3218: anena me vīryaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavatv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas taṃ vīryam ārabhate,
K02sspp2_2u:3219: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ vīryasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī vīryapāramiteti. tathā hi kokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
K02sspp2_2u:3223: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇa ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate
K02sspp2_2u:3224: sattvān nopalabhyate vīryaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś
K02sspp2_2u:3225: ca tad vīryaṃ niryatayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K02sspp2_2u:3226: pariṇāmayañ cāpi ca nimittam na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā vīryapāramitā tathā hi (ŚsP II-2 90)
K02sspp2_2u:3227: lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
K02sspp2_2u:3228: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
K02sspp2_2u:3230: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K02sspp2_2u:3231: tac ca saṃniśritaḥ samāpadyate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyate sarvasattvānām arthāya,
K02sspp2_2u:3233: ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi tac ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāna upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ
K02sspp2_2u:3234: sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dhyānaphalenaite
K02sspp2_2u:3235: sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti,
K02sspp2_2u:3236: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K02sspp2_2u:3237: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dhyānasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī dhyānapāramiteti,
K02sspp2_2u:3238: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati,
K02sspp2_2u:3243: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānāni samāpadyamāna ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati,
K02sspp2_2u:3246: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittan na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā dhyānapāramitā tathā hi lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
K02sspp2_2u:3247: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
K02sspp2_2u:3249: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
K02sspp2_2u:3250: tāñ ca saṃniśrito bhāvayati sarvapāpaṃ pratideśayati,
K02sspp2_2u:3251: ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cārthāya sarvapuṇyam anumodyate sarvabuddhān adhyeṣate upalambhayogena
K02sspp2_2u:3252: tac ca sarvakuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupāyena tasyaivaṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3253: bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmi sarvasattvānām arthāya iyaṃ prajñā imāṃ buddhājñāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3254: karomi. tāṃ ca prajñāṃ bhāvayann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3255: kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati anena me prajñāphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa
K02sspp2_2u:3256: eva dharme sukhino bhavantv anutpādāya ca parinirvāntv iti,
K02sspp2_2u:3257: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayanti,
K02sspp2_2u:3258: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ prajñāsaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī (ŚsP II-2 91)
K02sspp2_2u:3259: prajñāpāramitā tathā hi lokān na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
K02sspp2_2u:3263: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate prajñān nopalabhyate vipākaś ca
K02sspp2_2u:3266: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittan na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate
K02sspp2_2u:3267: lokottarā prajñāpāramitā tathā hi lokāc caraty uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottarā prajñāpāramiteti.
K02sspp2_2u:3268: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayati.
K02sspp2_2u:3269: āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:3296: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:3303: catvāry āryasatyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:3313: daśatathāgatabalāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:3318: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:3319: āha: sādhu sādhv āyuṣman subhūte katamasyā ayaṃ pāramitāyāḥ puruṣakāraḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:3321: prajñāpāramitāyā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāyaṃ puruṣakāraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:3322: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā (ŚsP II-2 93)
K02sspp2_2u:3323: janayitrī sarvakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3324: prajñāpāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra parigrāhikā saṃgrāhikā sarvakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3325: śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_2u:3326: caritaiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:3327: anāgatā apy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā atraiva prajñāpāramitāyāñ
K02sspp2_2u:3328: caritvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. ye 'pi te āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_2u:3329: daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti,
K02sspp2_2u:3331: sacet punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:3332: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitatvaṃ vā veditavyam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
K02sspp2_2u:3333: viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇa yad uta sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇāya
K02sspp2_2u:3334: sarvasattvānām aparityāgatāyai tac cānupalambhayogena viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K02sspp2_2u:3336: āha: viharatum āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yam anena vihāreṇecchasi,
K02sspp2_2u:3337: avirahitaṃ cānena manasikāreṇa yad uta mahākaruṇā manasikāreṇa,
K02sspp2_2u:3338: evaṃ saty āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:3341: sādhu sādhv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra upālapsye upālapsya iti. ata evāyuṣmatā śāradvatīputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:3342: sattvāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra manasikārāsattā veditavyā sattvābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā sattvāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā
K02sspp2_2u:3991: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahita eva tena manasikāreṇa veditavyaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:3993: atha bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt:
K02sspp2_2u:3995: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā,
K02sspp2_2u:3996: yathā tvam upadiśasi yathāpi taṃ tathāgatasyānubhāvena evaṃ ca punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:3997: yathā tvam upadiśasi. asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitā parivartā.
K02sspp2_2u:3998: āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāne ayam trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍ vikāram akaṃpat prākaṃpat saṃprākaṃpat,
K02sspp2_2u:4017: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādur akārṣīt.
K02sspp2_2u:4019: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasyāviṣkaraṇe?
K02sspp2_2u:4020: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K02sspp2_2u:4021: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva pūrvasyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:4022: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
K02sspp2_2u:4024: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva dakṣiṇasyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:4025: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho imām
K02sspp2_2u:4027: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva paścimāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:4028: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
K02sspp2_2u:4030: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivottarāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:4031: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
K02sspp2_2u:4033: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivottarapūrvasyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:4034: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
K02sspp2_2u:4036: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:4037: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
K02sspp2_2u:4040: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:4041: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
K02sspp2_2u:4043: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva paścimottarasyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:4044: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
K02sspp2_2u:4046: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivādhastād
K02sspp2_2u:4047: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
K02sspp2_2u:4049: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivopariṣṭād
K02sspp2_2u:4050: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
K02sspp2_2u:4052: yasmin khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitānirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe dvādaśānām ayutānāṃ devamāṇuṣyakānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir
K02sspp2_2u:4053: teṣām api samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānām asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyānāṃ sattvānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni.
K02sspp2_2u:4056: atha khalu yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasāhasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
K02sspp2_2u:4057: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śakrā devendrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā
K02sspp2_2u:4058: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau suyāmā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā
K02sspp2_2u:4059: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau saṃtuṣitā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā
K02sspp2_2u:4060: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau nirmitā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā
K02sspp2_2u:4061: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau vaśavartinā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
K02sspp2_2u:4062: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahābrahmāṇas te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā
K02sspp2_2u:4063: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ābhāsvarā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā
K02sspp2_2u:4064: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śubhakṛtsnā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
K02sspp2_2u:4065: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bṛhatphalā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā
K02sspp2_2u:4066: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
K02sspp2_2u:4067: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yaś ca teṣāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:4068: yaś ca teṣāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:4069: yaś ca teṣāṃ yāmānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:4070: yaś ca teṣāṃ tuṣitānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:4071: yaś ca teṣāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:4072: yaś ca teṣāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:4073: yaś ca teṣāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:4076: yaś ca teṣām śubhakṛtsnānām devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:4077: yaś ca teṣāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:4078: yaś ca teṣāṃ śuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:4079: sa tathāgatasya prakṛtyavabhāsasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K02sspp2_2u:4083: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate,
K02sspp2_2u:4084: tathāgatasya prakṛtyā ābhāyāḥ purataḥ sarvās tā devānāṃ karmavipākajā ābhā na bhāsante na tapanti na virocante,
K02sspp2_2u:4085: tathāgatasyaiṣābhā sāgrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate viśiṣṭākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāte praṇītākhyāyate anuttarākhyāyate niruttarākhyāyate.
K02sspp2_2u:4086: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K02sspp2_2u:4087: ete bhadanta subhūte yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
K02sspp2_2u:4088: devāḥ trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devā tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
K02sspp2_2u:4089: devā brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā
K02sspp2_2u:4090: devās te sarve saṃnipatitā bhadanta subhūte dharmaśravaṇāya prajñāpāramitopadeśaṃ śrotukāmāḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:4091: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
K02sspp2_2u:4093: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāraitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam?
K02sspp2_2u:4094: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakram devānām indram etad avocat:
K02sspp2_2u:4095: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikurūpadeśyāmi buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena
K02sspp2_2u:4096: ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K02sspp2_2u:4097: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ yathā ca śikṣitavyam. yaiś ca devaputrair anuttarāyai
K02sspp2_2u:4099: tair apy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitavyam. ye punar avakrāntasamyaktvanyāmāt,
K02sspp2_2u:4100: te pratibalā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:4103: api tu khalu punas teṣām apy anumode saced anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhyaye cittam utpādayati,
K02sspp2_2u:4104: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kuśalapakṣasyāntarāyaṃ karomi viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:4105: tatra katamā kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā?
K02sspp2_2u:4106: iha kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittotpādena,
K02sspp2_2u:5283: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair dānapāramitāyāṃ caraty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5289: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5290: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5291: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāra ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5293: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ pañca balāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5294: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ sapta bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5296: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5297: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri dhyānāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5298: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāry apramāṇāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5301: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair aṣṭau vimokṣāṃ bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5308: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri vaiśāradyāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5309: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5312: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair aṣṭā daśāveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:5313: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate
K02sspp2_2u:5314: dharmā evaite dharmān abhiṣyandayanti pariṣyandayanti paripūrayanti parispharayanti parimīmāṃsyante,
K02sspp2_2u:5315: nāsty atrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ va. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:5316: tathā hi yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na samavahitaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5317: yad bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na samavahitaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5318: yat kauśika pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_2u:5319: yad bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. iyaṃ kausika bodhisattvasya
K02sspp2_2u:5320: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad evaṃ sarvadharmāś ca pratyavekṣate na kvacid dharmeṣu paricarati.
K02sspp2_2u:5321: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtisthaviram etad avocat:
K02sspp2_2u:5322: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūtte pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhicitte na samavahitam?
K02sspp2_2u:5324: kathaṃ pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
K02sspp2_2u:5326: kathaṃ bodhicittaṃ pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
K02sspp2_2u:5330: iti hi yad acittaṃ tad acintyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5331: yad acintyaṃ tad acittaṃ na hy acittatā acittatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
K02sspp2_2u:5333: iti hi yā acittatā sā acintyatā yā acintyatā sā acittatā,
K02sspp2_2u:5335: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
K02sspp2_2u:5336: sādhu sādhu subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitām upadiśasy utsāhaṃ dadāsi.
K02sspp2_2u:5339: tathā hi paurvakānāṃ tathāgatānām arham arhantāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike taiḥ śrāvakais
K02sspp2_2u:5340: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu codito
K02sspp2_2u:5341: 'nuśiṣṭāḥ saṃdarśitaḥ samādāyitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ
K02sspp2_2u:5342: yato bhagavaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitaḥ. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K02sspp2_2u:5343: abhisaṃbuddhaḥ evam eva bhagavann asmābhir bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv
K02sspp2_2u:5349: asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv avavaditā anuśiṣṭāḥ saṃharṣitāḥ
K02sspp2_2u:5350: samādāpitaḥ samuttejitāḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K02sspp2_2u:5351: athāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakram devānām indram etad avocat:
K02sspp2_2u:5352: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5353: yathā ca na sthātavyaṃ rūpaṃ kauśika rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5359: iti hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā ca vedanāśūnyatā ca saṃjñāśūnyatā ca saṃskāraśūnyatā ca
K02sspp2_2u:5360: vijñānaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika
K02sspp2_2u:5362: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5369: iti hi kauśika cakṣuḥśūnyatā ca śrotraśūnyatā ca ghrāṇaśūnyatā ca jihvāśūnyatā ca
K02sspp2_2u:5370: kāyaśūnyatā ca manaḥśūnyatā ca bodisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ
K02sspp2_2u:5371: khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5372: punar aparaṃ kauśika rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5379: iti hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā ca śabdaśūnyatā ca gandhaśūnyatā ca rasaśūnyatā ca sparśaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5380: ca dharmaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika
K02sspp2_2u:5382: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣurvijnānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5389: iti hi kauśika cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatā ca śrotravijñānaśūnyatā ca ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5390: ca jihvāvijñānaśūnyatā ca kāyavijñānaśūnyatā ca manovijnānaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5391: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5392: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:5399: iti hi kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5400: ca jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5401: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5402: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanayā śūnyā,
K02sspp2_2u:5410: iti hi kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca
K02sspp2_2u:5412: ca manaḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_2u:5413: evaṃ klialu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5414: punar aparaṃ kauśika pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātunā śūnyaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:5421: iti hi kauśika pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā cābdhātuśūnyatā ca tejodhātuśūnyatā ca vāyudhātuśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5422: c ākāśadhātuśūnyatā ca vijñānadhātuśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_2u:5423: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5437: iti hi kauśikāvidyāśūnyatā ca saṃskāraśūnyatā ca vijñānaśūnyatā ca nāmarūpaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5438: ca ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyatā ca sparśaśūnyatā ca vedanāśūnyatā ca tṛṣṇāśūnyatā copādānaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5439: ca bhavaśūnyatā ca jātiśūnyatā ca jarāmaraṇaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam
K02sspp2_2u:5440: etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5441: punar aparaṃ kauśika dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā,
K02sspp2_2u:5448: iti hi kauśika dānapāramitāśūnyatā ca śīlapāramitāśūnyatā ca kṣāntipāramitāśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5449: ca vīryapāramitāśūnyatā ca dhyānapāramitāśūnyatā ca prajñāpāramitāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5451: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5471: iti hi kauśikādhyātmaśūnyatā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ca śūnyatāśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5472: ca mahāśūnyatā ca paramārthaśūnyatā ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatā cāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā cātyantaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5473: cānavarāgraśūnyatā cānavakāraśūnyatā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5474: cānupalambhaśūnyatā cābhāvaśūnyatā ca svabhāvaśūnyatā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5475: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5476: punar aparaṃ kauśika smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni,
K02sspp2_2u:5484: iti hi kauśika smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatā ca samyakprahāṇaśūnyatā ca ṛddhipādaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5485: cendriyaśūnyatā ca balaśūnyatā ca bodhyaṅgaśūnyatā ca mārgaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5486: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5487: punar aparaṃ kauśika āryasatyāny āryasatyaiḥ śūnyāni,
K02sspp2_2u:5505: iti hi kauśikāryasatyaśūnyatā ca dhyānaśūnyatā cāpramāṇaśūnyatā cārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5507: cābhijñāśūnyatā ca samādhiśūnyatā ca dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatā ca tathāgatabalaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5508: ca vaiśāradyaśūnyatā ca pratisaṃvidśūnyatā ca mahāmaitrīśūnyatā ca mahākaruṇāśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5509: cāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ
K02sspp2_2u:5510: khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5511: punar aparaṃ kauśika śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5512: pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena śūnyaṃ buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5514: iti hi śrāvakayānaśūnyatā ca pratyekabuddhayānaśūnyatā ca buddhayānaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5515: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5516: punar aparaṃ kauśika śrāvakaḥ śrāvakena śūnyaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:5520: iti hi śrāvakaśūnyatā ca pratyekabuddhaśūnyatā ca buddhaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā
K02sspp2_2u:5521: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K02sspp2_2u:5522: punar aparaṃ kauśika srotaāpattiphalaṃ srotaāpattiphalena śūnyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:5530: iti hi śrotraāpattiphalaśūnyatā ca sakṛdāgāmiphalaśūnyatā cānāgāmiphalaśūnyatā cārhatphalaśūnyatā ca pratyekabodhiśūnyatā ca mārgākārajñatāśūnyatā (ŚsP II-2 143)
K02sspp2_2u:5531: ca sarvākārajñatāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:5532: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
K02sspp2_2u:5533: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sthātavyam?
K02sspp2_2u:5535: iti hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpe na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5657: kāya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena, (ŚsP II-2 146)
K02sspp2_2u:5745: pratisaṃvida iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena, (ŚsP II-2 148)
K02sspp2_2u:5760: rūpaṃ nityam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5761: rūpam anityam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5762: rūpaṃ sukham iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,

K02sspp2_2u:5765: rūpaṃ śubham ity aśubham iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5766: rūpaṃ śāntam ity aśāntam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5767: rūpaṃ viviktam ity aviviktam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:5768: rūpaṃ śūnyam ity aśūnyam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,

K02sspp2_2u:6757: sakṛdāgāmī dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6758: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6759: arhan dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6760: pratyekabuddho dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6761: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6762: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6772: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpāde sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6786: bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhabhūmau sthāsyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6789: pañcasu bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā aprameyāny asaṃkhyeyāni buddhakṣetrāṇy upasaṃkramiṣyāmi
K02sspp2_2u:6790: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya śrutvā ca
K02sspp2_2u:6791: tathatvāya parebhyo deśayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6792: yādṛśāni ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāni tadṛśāni eva pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6793: sattvān bodhau paripācayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6794: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃś ca lokadhātuṃ gatvā tān tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkariṣyāmīti gurukariṣyāmīti mānayiṣyāmīti pūjayiṣyāmīti,
K02sspp2_2u:6795: puṣpamālyagandhavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ koṭīniyutaśatasahasraiś ca tāṃs tathāgatāṃ pūjayiṣyāmīty evam api na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6796: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6797: pañcacakṣuṣy utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. katamāni pañca?
K02sspp2_2u:6798: māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6800: yena yena punaḥ samādhīn ākāṅkṣayiṣyāmi vikrīḍituṃ tena tena samādhinā vikrīḍiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogema,
K02sspp2_2u:6803: catvāri vaiśāradyāni pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6804: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6807: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti evam api bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6808: dvātriṃśatāni mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam (ŚsP II-2 180)
K02sspp2_2u:6810: aśīty anuvyañjanāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6816: kulaṃkula ity ekavīcika iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6818: āyuḥkṣaye kleśakṣaye ceti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6820: sakṛdāgāmi sakṛd imaṃ lokam āgamya duḥkhasyāṃ taṃ kariṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6821: anāgagāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratikannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6822: anāgāmi tatraiva nirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6823: arhatphalasākṣātkriyāyaiḥ pratipannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6824: arhann ihaivānupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6826: atikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca bodhisattvabhūmau sthāsyāmīti iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6827: mārgākārajñatājñāne sarvākārajñatāyāṃ ca na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6828: sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbuddhā sarvāvāsanā na saṃvikte śakṣayāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6829: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakrapravartayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6830: buddhakārye kṛtvā aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti,
K02sspp2_2u:6832: caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpatsye yathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān tiṣṭheyam iti na sthātavyam
K02sspp2_2u:6833: aparimitaś ca me āyur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6834: dvātriṃśatāṃ me mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānām ekaikalakṣaṇaṃ śatapuṇyapariniṣpannaṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6844: tāvanta ekaṃ me buddhakṣetraṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6845: vajropamo me trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6846: bodhivṛkṣāś ca me tādṛśo gandho niścaret,
K02sspp2_2u:6847: ye sattvās taṃ gandham ājighreyus teṣām na rāgadveṣamohāś ca vyābādheyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6848: na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam utpadyeyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6849: sarve ca te niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyā samyaksaṃbuddhāv iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6850: ye ca sattvās taṃ bodhivṛkṣagandham ājighreyus teṣāṃ na kaścid vyādhir bhaved kāye vā citte veti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6851: tatra ca me buddhakṣetre na rūpaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6852: na vedanāśabdo bhaven na saṃjñāśabdo bhaven na saṃskāraśabdo bhaven na vijñānaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6853: na dhātuśabdo nāyatanaśabdo na pratītyasamutpādaśabdo bhaved iti sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6854: na dānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na śīlapāramitāśabdo bhaven na kṣāntipāramitāśabdo bhaven
K02sspp2_2u:6855: na vīryapāramitāśabdo bhaven na dhyānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na prajñāpāramitāśabdo
K02sspp2_2u:6857: nādhyātmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na bahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6858: na śūnyatāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na mahāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na paramārthaśūnyatāśabdo
K02sspp2_2u:6859: bhaven na saṃsrtaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6860: nātyantaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavarāgraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavakāraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na prakṛtiśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6861: na sarvadharmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānupalambhaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6862: nābhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena, (ŚsP II-2 182)
K02sspp2_2u:6863: na smṛtyupasthānaśabdo bhaven na samyakprahāṇaśabdo bhaven na ṛddhipādaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6864: nendriyaśabdo bhaven na balaśabdo bhaven na bodhyaṅgaśabdo bhaven nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśabdo bhaven nāryasatyaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavaym upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6865: na dhyānaśabdo bhaven nāpramāṇaśabdo bhaven nārūpyasamāpattiśabdo bhaven na vimokṣaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6867: bhaven nābhijñāśabdo bhaven na samādhiśabdo bhaven na dhāraṇīmukhaśabdo bhaved iti
K02sspp2_2u:6869: na tathāgatabalaśabdo bhaven na vaiśāradyaśabdo bhaven na pratisaṃvidśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6870: na mahāmaitrīśabdo bhaven na mahākaruṇāśabdo bhaven nāveṇikabuddhadharmaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6871: na srotaāpattiśabdo bhaven na sakṛdāgāmiśabdo bhaven nānāgāmiśabdo bhaven nārhattvaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_2u:6872: na pratyekabuddhaśabdo bhaven na buddhaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:6873: tathā hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6874: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6876: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
K02sspp2_2u:6877: athāyuṣmataḥ subhūtir āyuṣmataḥ śāradvatīputrasya cetasyaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmataṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayati sma. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_2u:6878: āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6879: āha: na kvacid āyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthita iti apratisthitamānasaḥ
K02sspp2_2u:6880: khalu punar āyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa rūpe na sthito vedanāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6881: na sthitaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ na sthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu na sthito vijñāne na sthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6882: na cakṣuṣi sthito na śrotre sthito na ghrāṇe sthito na jihvāyāṃ sthito na kāye sthito na manasi sthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6884: na rūpe sthito na śabde sthito na gandhe sthito na rase sthito na sparśe sthito na dharmeṣu sthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6885: na cakṣurvijñāne sthito na śrotravijñāne sthito na ghrāṇavijñāne sthito na jihvāvijñāne sthito na kāyavijñāne sthito na manovijñāne sthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6886: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthito na śrotrasaṃsparśe sthito na ghrāṇasaṃsparśe sthito na jihvāsaṃsparśe sthito na kāyasaṃsparśe sthito na manaḥsaṃsparśe
K02sspp2_2u:6887: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito
K02sspp2_2u:6888: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito
K02sspp2_2u:6889: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6890: na pṛthivīdhātau sthito nābdhātau sthito na tejodhātau sthito na vāyudhātau sthito nākāśadhātau sthito na vijñānadhātau sthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6891: nāvidyāyāṃ sthito na saṃskāreṣu sthito na vijñāne sthito na nāmarūpe sthito na ṣaḍāyatane
K02sspp2_2u:6892: sthito na sparśe sthito na vedanāyāṃ sthito na tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthito nopādāne sthito na
K02sspp2_2u:6893: bhave sthito na jātau sthito na jarāmaraṇe sthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6894: na dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito na śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito na vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6895: nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6896: sthito na śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na mahāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6897: sthito na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6898: sthito nānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6899: sthito na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6900: sthito nābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6901: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu sthito na samyakprahāṇeṣu sthito na ṛddhipādeṣu sthito nendriyeṣu
K02sspp2_2u:6902: sthito na baleṣu sthito na bodhyaṅgeṣu sthito nāryāṣṭāṅge marge sthito nāryasatyeṣu
K02sspp2_2u:6903: sthito na dhyāneṣu sthito nāpramāṇeṣu sthito nārūpyasamāpattiṣu sthito na vimokṣeṣu
K02sspp2_2u:6905: sthito nābhijñāsu sthito na samādhiṣu sthito na dhāraṇīmukheṣu (ŚsP II-2 184)
K02sspp2_2u:6906: sthito na tathāgatabaleṣu sthito na vaiśāradyeṣu sthito na pratisaṃvitsu sthito na
K02sspp2_2u:6907: mahāmaitryā sthito na mahākaruṇāyāṃ sthito nāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu sthito na sarvajñatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6908: sthito na mārgākārajñatāyāṃ sthito na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6910: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:6911: yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rūpe naiva sthito nāsthito vedanāyāṃ naiva
K02sspp2_2u:6912: sthito nāsthitaḥ samjñāyām naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu naiva sthito nāsthito
K02sspp2_2u:6914: cakṣuṣi naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotre naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇe naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāye naiva sthito nāsthito manasi naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6915: rūpe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śabde naiva sthito nāsthito gandhe naiva sthito nāsthito rase naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ sparśe naiva sthito nāsthito dharmeṣu naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6916: cakṣurvijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotravijñāne naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇavijñāne
K02sspp2_2u:6917: naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāvijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyavijñāne naiva sthito
K02sspp2_2u:6919: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇasaṃsparśe
K02sspp2_2u:6920: naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe naiva sthito
K02sspp2_2u:6923: naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6924: naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6926: pṛthivīdhātau naiva sthito nāsthito 'bdhātau naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ tejodhātau naiva
K02sspp2_2u:6927: sthito nāsthito vāyudhātau naiva sthito nāsthita ākāśadhātau naiva sthito nāsthito
K02sspp2_2u:6929: avidyāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu naiva sthito nāsthito vijñāne naiva sthito
K02sspp2_2u:6930: nāsthito nāmarūpe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ ṣaḍāyatane naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ sparśe
K02sspp2_2u:6931: naiva sthito nāsthito vedanāyāṃ naiva sthito (ŚsP II-2 185)
K02sspp2_2u:6932: nāsthitaḥ tṛṣṇāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthita upādāne naiva sthito nāsthito bhave naiva sthito nāsthito jātau naiva sthito nāsthito jarāmaraṇe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6933: dānapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6934: naiva sthito nāsthito vīryapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ naiva
K02sspp2_2u:6935: sthito nāsthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
K02sspp2_2u:6936: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito
K02sspp2_2u:6937: 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
K02sspp2_2u:6938: nāsthito mahāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
K02sspp2_2u:6939: nāsthitaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
K02sspp2_2u:6940: nāsthito 'tyantaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito navarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
K02sspp2_2u:6941: nāsthito 'navakāraśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
K02sspp2_2u:6942: nāsthitaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva
K02sspp2_2u:6943: sthito nāsthito 'nupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'bhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva
K02sspp2_2u:6944: sthito nāsthitaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_2u:6972: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ sthātavyam ity asthānayogena.
K02sspp2_2u:6974: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāñcid devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
K02sspp2_2u:6975: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni vijñāyante,
K02sspp2_2u:6977: idaṃ punar api na vijñāyate yad āryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayati vibhajaty uttānīkaroti upadiśati.
K02sspp2_2u:6978: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān āmantrayate sma,
K02sspp2_2u:6983: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram api na pravyāhrite tan na śruyate yan na śruyate tan na vijñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:6984: na hy akṣarāṇi prajñāpāramitā na cātra kaścid deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:6985: anakṣarā hi devaputrās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ tad yathāpi
K02sspp2_2u:6986: nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīte. sa ca punar
K02sspp2_2u:6988: atha sa nirmitaḥ tābhyo nirmitābhyaś catasṛbhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
K02sspp2_2u:6989: devaputrāḥ. api tu tatra parṣadi kenacid deśitaṃ bhavet?
K02sspp2_2u:6993: evam eva devaputrāḥ sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tatra kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:6994: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ svapnāntaragataḥ puruṣas tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhadharmaṃ deśayantaṃ paśyet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
K02sspp2_2u:6995: devaputrāḥ. api nu tatra deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
K02sspp2_2u:6998: evam eva devaputrāḥ svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid
K02sspp2_2u:6999: śrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ dvau puruṣau parvatakandare
K02sspp2_2u:7000: sthitvā buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ dharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:7001: tatra ubhayataḥ pratiśrutkāt svaro niścatet. tat kiṃ manyadhve? (ŚsP II-2 187)
K02sspp2_2u:7002: devaputrāḥ. api nu tenaikena pratiśrutkāśabdena dvitīyapratiśrutkāśabdo vijñāpito bhavet.
K02sspp2_2u:7006: tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:7007: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrā dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe tathāgatam
K02sspp2_2u:7008: arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham abhinirmimīte. catasraś ca parṣado 'binirmimīto bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāśikāḥ
K02sspp2_2u:7009: sa ca nirmitas tābhyo nirmitābhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
K02sspp2_2u:7011: api nu tatra kenacid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
K02sspp2_2u:7014: evam eva devaputrā māyopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid ājñātam.
K02sspp2_2u:7016: uttarīkariṣyati batāyam āryasthaviraḥ subhūtir uttānīkariṣyati batāyam āryasthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitām iti,
K02sspp2_2u:7017: atha ca punar gambhīrād gambhīrataraṃ deśayati,
K02sspp2_2u:7019: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣām devaputrāṇām cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat:
K02sspp2_2u:7020: na khalu devaputrā rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:7024: na vijñānaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7035: na mano gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7048: na dharmā gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7060: na manovijñānaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7072: na manaḥsaṃsparśo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7084: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7097: na vijñānadhātur gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7115: na jarāmaraṇaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7133: na prajñāpāramitā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7158: nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7168: nānavarāgraśūnyatāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ nānavakāraśūnyatāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:7195: śūkṣmāṇi, na pratisaṃvido gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:7198: nāveṇikabuddhadharmā gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7224: na sarvākārajñatā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_2u:7229: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:7234: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥ prajñapitaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:7240: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:7246: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:7253: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:7307: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni prajñapitāni,
K02sspp2_2u:7330: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ srotaāpannaḥ prajñapito na srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:7331: na sakṛdāgāmī prajñapito na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:7334: na pratyekabuddhaḥ prajñapito na pratyekabodhiḥ prajñapitā,
K02sspp2_2u:7335: na bodhisattvaḥ prajñapito na bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ prajñapitāḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:7336: na buddhaḥ prajñapito na bodhiḥ prajñapitā,
K02sspp2_2u:7338: athāyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
K02sspp2_2u:7339: evam etad devaputrā evam etad iti tad anabhilāpyā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddānāṃ bodhiḥ,
K02sspp2_2u:7340: apravyāhārā sā na kenacid chrutā na vijñātā.
K02sspp2_2u:7341: tena hi devaputrā ye srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
K02sspp2_2u:7342: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale sthātukāmāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
K02sspp2_2u:7343: ye 'nāgāmīphale sthātukāmā anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
K02sspp2_2u:7344: ye 'rhattve sthātukāmā arhattvaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
K02sspp2_2u:7345: ye pratyekabodhau sthātukāmāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ sākṣātkartukamā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
K02sspp2_2u:7346: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthātukāmā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya.
K02sspp2_2u:7347: evaṃ khalu devaputrā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_2u:7349: śatasāhasryāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvitīyakhaṇḍe caturdaśamaḥ parivartaḥ samāptaḥ.
